data.eml:eml: The Cylindrobulla / Ascobulla complex—unraveling problems in identification and adding to Cylindrobulla diversity (Gastropoda, Heterobranchia, Sacoglossa) by describing a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Laetz, Elise, Christa, Gregor, Händeler, Katharina, Wägele, Heike (2014): The Cylindrobulla / Ascobulla complex—unraveling problems in identification and adding to Cylindrobulla diversity (Gastropoda, Heterobranchia, Sacoglossa) by describing a new species. Zootaxa 3893 (3): 339-362, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3893.3.2
